Parameters: Context: The context of the shared preferences.
int: The resource ID of the preference XML file.

boolean: Whether to re-read the default values. If false, this method sets the default values only if this method has never been called in the past (or if the @B_android#preference#PreferenceManager#KEY_HAS_SET_DEFAULT_VALUES_E@ in the default value shared preferences file is false). To attempt to set the default values again bypassing this check, set readAgain to true. Note: this will NOT reset preferences back to their default values. For that functionality, use PreferenceManager#getDefaultSharedPreferences(Context) and clear it followed by a call to this method with this parameter set to true.
setDefaultValues(android.content.Context.Description: Sets the default values from an XML preference file by reading the values defined by each @B_android#preference#Preference_E@ item's android:defaultValue attribute. This should be called by the application's main activity.
setDefaultValues(android.content.Context.history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 29

setStorageDeviceProtected().Description: Explicitly set the storage location used internally by this class to be device-protected storage. On devices with direct boot, data stored in this location is encrypted with a key tied to the physical device, and it can be accessed immediately after the device has booted successfully, both before and after the user has authenticated with their credentials (such as a lock pattern or PIN). Because device-protected data is available without user authentication, you should carefully limit the data you store using this Context. For example, storing sensitive authentication tokens or passwords in the device-protected area is strongly discouraged.
setStorageDeviceProtected().history: Added in API level 24 Deprecated in API level 29

Parameters: Context: The context of the shared preferences.
String: A custom name for the shared preferences file.
int: The file creation mode for the shared preferences file, such as @B_android#content#Context#MODE_PRIVATE_E@ or @B_android#content#Context#MODE_PRIVATE_E@
int: The resource ID of the preference XML file.

boolean: Whether to re-read the default values. If false, this method will set the default values only if this method has never been called in the past (or if the @B_android#preference#PreferenceManager#KEY_HAS_SET_DEFAULT_VALUES_E@ in the default value shared preferences file is false). To attempt to set the default values again bypassing this check, set readAgain to true. Note: this will NOT reset preferences back to their default values. For that functionality, use PreferenceManager#getDefaultSharedPreferences(Context) and clear it followed by a call to this method with this parameter set to true.

ClassDesc: Use the Used to help create @B_android#preference#Preference_E@ hierarchies from activities or XML. In most cases, clients should use @B_android#preference#PreferenceActivity#addPreferencesFromIntent_E@ or @B_android#preference#PreferenceActivity#addPreferencesFromResource_E@.
